item.title: Halloween 2025: All the celebrity costumes at Heidi Klum's party
item.description: Stars showed out in their Halloween best at Heidi Klum's annual party.

item.title: Scavenging for food in streets - desperation takes hold in Jamaica after hurricane
item.description: People in Black River haven't seen any aid and told the BBC that they are fighting to survive.

item.title: Egypt's Grand Museum opens, displaying Tutankhamun tomb in full for first time
item.description: The launch of the billion-dollar site sees fresh calls for the return of antiquities held in museums overseas.

item.title: Why the Indian passport is falling in global ranking
item.description: Indians can travel to more visa-free destinations than a decade ago, but India's passport ranking has declined.

item.title: 'I was accused of spying and beaten' - a boy's escape from captured Sudan city
item.description: A 12-year-old tells the BBC that in the chaos he lost contact with his family and is now on his own at a camp.
